author: danim
title: A nice little set
review: I got this set for Christmas last year and I thought it was a very nice addition to my lego city, altered this set a little by adding a small tank on the rear to use as a gritter, a brilliant addition to a city get this set if you ever see it.

author: FlyBy
title: Clearing The Streets
review:
I've recently been searching for directions of old models so that I can organize my collection and just rebuilt this little gem.  I remember getting this new in 1988 when it came out, it's just as great now as it was then.  As mentioned above, it's a great addition to any city set so if you see one pop up, really consider picking it up.

If I could only find the mini figure for it then it would be complete!

author: Wipipi
title: Perfect stocking stuffer!
review:
I had gotten this set last year for Christmas and I was surprised on how much of a delight it was! Let's get into the pros and cons.

Pros

  • One of the only Christmas/winter themed classic town sets!
  • Nice and cheap way to get a figure and a vehicle!
  • Could be used outside of shoveling snow.

Cons

  • Nothing to use for snow! It would've been perfect if Lego were to provide a few white 1x1 studs to plow with the snow plow!

Final Verdict

To conclude, this really is a great stocking stuffer. Not only is it themed for Christmas/winter, it can clear the streets of snow, leaving the Lego town folk happy and the Lego kids sad! On top of that, it can be used outside of just for the winter season, like plowing through dirt on a construction sight! I give this set an 8/10!
